title: integration-tests/reactive-oracle-client fails in native mode
body:
### Describe the bug

integration-tests/reactive-oracle-client fails in native mode

Running command `mvn -f integration-tests/pom.xml clean verify -Pnative -Dquarkus.native.container-build=true -Dquarkus.native.native-image-xmx=5g -U -V -B -fae -Denforcer.skip=true -Dtest-containers -Dstart-containers -pl reactive-oracle-client`

Getting `Caused by: com.oracle.graal.pointsto.constraints.UnresolvedElementException: Discovered unresolved type during parsing: oracle.security.pki.OraclePKIProvider. This error is reported at image build time because class oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver is registered for linking at image build time by command line`

More details:
```

  13,656 (60.78%) of 22,469 fields reachable
  43,642 (64.54%) of 67,624 methods reachable
     344 classes,   290 fields, and   540 methods registered for reflection

Fatal error: com.oracle.graal.pointsto.util.AnalysisError$ParsingError: Error encountered while parsing oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver.defaultConnection()
Parsing context:

```

### Expected behavior

Tests pass

### Actual behavior

Failure in native mode

### How to Reproduce?

mvn -f integration-tests/pom.xml clean verify -Pnative -Dquarkus.native.container-build=true -Dquarkus.native.native-image-xmx=5g -U -V -B -fae -Denforcer.skip=true -Dtest-containers -Dstart-containers -pl reactive-oracle-client


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.13" 2021-10-19

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

quay.io/quarkus/ubi-quarkus-native-image:22.1-java11

### Quarkus version or git rev

Quarkus main

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.1

### Additional information

_No response_
